title: Skinnytaste by Vremi Air Fryer - XL Capacity, 5.8 Quart, 1700 Watt, Digital Touch Screen with 8 Cooking Presets, Bonus Recipe Booklet
features:
Make sure this fits
                by entering your model number.

VREMI x SKINNYTASTE - Vremi partnered with Gina Homolka, SkinnyTaste blog founder and New York Times bestselling author to bring you an air fryer that will help you cook healthy and delicious fried meals using little to no oil. As a bonus, your air fryer will also include a booklet with 15 SkinnyTaste recipes featuring Gina‚Äôs favorite air fryer dishes.

DO MORE THAN FRY - Now you can easily fry, bake, roast and grill using only one appliance. Our 1700W power oilless air fryer uses hot air combined with 360¬∞ high rapid air circulation with a temperature range from 140 - 400¬∞F to cook healthier dishes faster than with a standard oven. Whip up your favorite dishes faster than ever with an average cook time of 10 to 12 minutes.

DIGITAL TOUCH-SCREEN WITH 8 COOKING PRESETS - With the touch of a button, quickly select one of 8 cooking presets to easily cook french fries, pork chops, shrimp, bacon, and more. Or, set your own time and temperature when you want greater control. A built-in pre-heat function ensures the unit heats to the desired temperature before you begin to cook.

EXTRA LARGE CAPACITY - With a 5.8 QT (5.5 L) large, removable, non-stick basket, it‚Äôs large enough to cook meals for the whole family or when hosting friends. It measures 13.8 x 13.8 x 13.4 in thoughtfully designed to fit on your kitchen countertop.

DISHWASHER SAFE, NON-STICK and PFOA-FREE - The outer pot, basket and the inside of the air fryer have a black, non-stick coating for super easy cleaning. Both the outer pot and basket are dishwasher safe, or can be cleaned with hot water, liquid detergent, and a non-abrasive sponge. This PFOA-free Teflon coated frying pan is FDA approved, and the Air Fryer meets the UL requirement and is certified by ETL, so have peace of mind while you cook.

productDescription: Using rapid air circulation, the Skinnytaste by Vremi Air Fryer lets you enjoy "fried" foods without the extra calories. By cooking your ingredients using hot air and 360¬∞ rapid air circulation, foods are heated from all directions to ensure fast, even cooking for healthier, more nutritious meals. Explore the air fryer's versatility, speed, and oil-free cooking options for food that's crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside.

Let's talk healthy meals. What beats delicious food that is low in fat and calories? According to Gina, pretty much nothing and we agree! Our air fryer cooks ingredients from every angle, using hot air circulation to make crispy, crunchy food with little to no oil needed! So you can have your fries and eat them too (literally).

Sweet potatoes are a go-to when it comes to air frying. Not only are they rich in fiber, but when cooked in the Skinnytaste by Vremi Air Fryer, they‚Äôre crispy like French fries but completely free of deep-fried fats.
We all get that ‚ÄúI need fries now‚Äù craving, learn to make your own batch of Chipotle Sweet Potato Fries and enjoy.
Ready to get your roast on? Skinnytaste Za‚Äôatar Lamb Chops can help you do just that. In 8 to 10 minutes,
you can have chops that are seared and flavorful‚Äîa perfect fix for any weeknight meal.
Cook chops, chicken, veggies and more to get oven roasted results, without the mess.

Everyone needs a little baking in their life, but it‚Äôs not always an easy feat. With the Skinnytaste by Vremi Air Fryer, Gina‚Äôs Garlic Knots make for a simple side to any dinner in a matter of minutes. Get golden, flakey crust, sprinkled with Parmesan and parsley, and serve with a warm marinara sauce for dipping.
Gina‚Äôs air fryer is all about opportunity, meaning more, more, and more to try!

With the Skinnytaste by Vremi Air Fryer and BONUS booklet combo, you‚Äôll have access to all these recipes plus Gina‚Äôs help along the way. With the push of a button, the 8 cooking presets let you enjoy a variety of homemade meals, plus a whole lot more.

reviews.reviewText: I have been wanting an air fryer for a while now and decided to hold out for the Skinnytaste one to be released. I received it on Saturday and immediately got it all set up and ready to use. I decided to throw a handful of frozen fries in to test it out. They came out great and tasted better than in the oven. Unfortunately, when I pulled the drawer out by the handle to look at the fries, the basket and handle detached from the drawer and the drawer fell on the floor. Thankfully there wasn‚Äôt any grease or other hot liquid in it! We have checked everything over to make sure I hadn‚Äôt put it together wrong, but it just looks like the clips that attach the basket to the drawer are just too small to support the weight. Hopefully they‚Äôll change this for a future design because I‚Äôd hate to see someone get hurt from a flying 400¬∞ metal basket.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sounds like there are lemons in this batch
reviews.reviewText:
My sister and I are huge Skinnytaste fans and were both interested in purchasing air fryers when we saw that she'd made this one with Vremi. I ordered one for my sister as a Mother's Day gift to try it out, and if she liked it I would order one for myself. We both wanted this to work, but after using it for dinner one time this weekend (we made wings and fries) the air fryer wouldn't turn on when we tried to use it a second time. It took a lot of cajoling until it finally worked again (and by that point the chicken was already in the oven).

Two stars for concept, but disappointed that the product does not seem to be well-made (especially for the price). I'm going to call customer service as well to see if we can get a replacement or a refund.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wish I would have waited for the kinks to be worked out
reviews.reviewText: ¬†I hate that I have to give a bad review on this product because I love, love, love Gina‚Äôs recipes but unfortunately this product needs more testing. I made hard boiled eggs and they were perfect, Italian sausage and they were perfect, went to make fries and the fryer turned off and the panel was frozen after it was preheated. I had to leave it sit for an hour before I was able to get it to work again. The look and simplicity of this product is great I just hope they can get the bugs figured out soon so people can actually use it.

I could not wait to get this. Plugged it in and the computer screen lit up, numbers were flashing, turned it off and it would not turn on again. Returning to Vremi and will buy a different one. So bummed üôÅ

I am a die hard skinny taste fan and have been waiting for this for a long time. I used it twice--correctly--but on the 3rd time the buttons stopped working and the lights are flashing like crazy. Maybe I got a lemon, but buyer beware.

I was so excited to get this air fryer! I preordered it and waited. We put it on the counter to set it up and immediately realized that the basket didn‚Äôt slide in. The plastic was all warped. So we picked it up to check it and something was rattling inside it as well. Ugh. Couldn‚Äôt exchange for some reason so just refunded. Not happy....

I used mine one time. The basket kept falling out, and it wouldn‚Äôt turn on for a second use. I wanted to support skinnytaste and waited for the release. Now I wish I had just order a tried and true one, but instead I‚Äôm waiting for a new and different one to arrive.
I was lucky enough to get a pro-type and have been using it on the daily! The size if the basket is larger than my older one, and I love that it's dishwasher safe.

I have been in the market for an air fryer for a long while, and once I saw this collab I decided to wait (even though I‚Äôm typically adamant about buying the most well reviewed product- that was my first mistake!) I pre- ordered this product and used it the day I received it. I cut up a sweet potato into fries and all was fine and dandy until halfway through the cook time, it stopped. When I tried to turn it back on, the display was completely malfunctioning. Buttons were flashing, things were beeping, and off it went again. I tried to unplug and plug back in. Nope. So disappointed! I learned my lesson and I‚Äôll be back to buying the best reviewed product from here on out!

This stopped working completely the first time I used it. The screen began flashing and then it stopped working. I tried all the troubleshooting suggestions and nothing worked. It will not even turn on now.

I was so excited to purchase this product. I am so sad and disappointed to say that the 2nd day I used it, 888 came up on the screen and it didn‚Äôt work at all. Thank you amazon for recognizing the problem and refunding my hard earned money. I really appreciate that but really wish this machine would work. She makes it seeem so seamless in her posts, but i‚Äôm Sad to say...do NOT buy this product

I preordered this and patiently waited to receive. I wanted this Skinny Taste air fryer for its large capacity and ease of cleaning. It arrived, I turned it on, set the temp and it powered off and wont come back on. Very disappointed in this new product.

It never worked. I bought it cause I‚Äôm a Skinnytaste follower & tried to use it twice (thought maybe it was me). The buttons didn‚Äôt work & when it did come on it had NO readings for control. Very disappointed. Returned immediately.

UPDATE - Soooo disappointed. After three weeks the fryer started malfunctioning. Preheats, initial cook okay but when you open to shake or flip the food it stops working.

I pre-ordered this product having never used an air fryer before. I have used it almost daily since receiving. Made the Chicken Parm Caprese and the chicken was crispy and juicy. A bit disappointed with the garlic knots but I think I know what I did wrong. Will try again. Tonight we had beef empanadas with the same crispy results. Warning - the food is VERY hot when it is removed from the basket so let it cool down a bit before digging in.
Be sure to read the manual. I suspect some of the negative reviews are because of user error.

Addendum - Using this appliance for two weeks now and am still very happy. Made some hush puppies for my North Carolina spouse and they were a hit!

I researched these dang Air Fryers for a week straight before I pulled the trigger and bought one. Constantly online reading reviews, comparing features, size, cost etc. until my eyes started to blur. It was originally the Skinnytaste Facebook group that got me thinking about getting an AF and all the things I could do with it. This one is the perfect size, it has all the presets to make it easy, but some of the reviews weren't great. Honestly, it sounded like it's a newer product and just a bit "buggy" but I noticed all the negative reviews were updated after stating that the manufacturer replaced their AF or whatever was the case. It sounded like they were really on top of it and that's what sold me. I have it a couple weeks and used it 3x so far with ZERO issues (just haven't been home enough to door more). I have big plans for this Air Fryer! I absolutely love it and so glad I went with my Vremi Skinnytaste AF. I certainly recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don‚Äôt be scared of the negative reviews. Awesome Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText:
I was a bit leery ordering this due to some of the reviews. I noticed that the majority of the bad reviews happened in May 2019 and I suspect there was a design flaw somewhere in a batch because before and after that had consistent good reviews.

That being said I ordered it and proceeded to unwrap it, clean it and read the manual. I decided to try the garlic Parmesan French fries. Let me tell you I am sold. Super easy and delicious. It called for 12 minutes but I like my fries crispier so I went 15. Perfection. I then attempted Ling Ling potstickers. Not a fan. I‚Äôll stick to the recommended way of making them lol.

All in all I am extremely pleased with this fryer. It is very large. You should not have an issue making large quantities in this bad boy. Well I‚Äôm off to make another batch of French fries! Mmmmmm

I've used this a handful of times now and the food so far is turning out fine, but I am very disappointed in the quality of the product itself. Yesterday the bottom of the fryer basket came off when I pulled out the drawer and it came crashing down on the dishes on my counter. Thankfully I wasn't burnt by any of the oil in the pan as there is so little and it bounced away from me, but had it bounced the other way it could have been dangerous. The product name has washed off the front with simple soap and water - that doesn't bode well. I'm a die hard Skinnytaste fan and found a way to get this unit shipped to me in Canada... now I know why the Canadian standards won't accept it! Buyer beware!!

I pre-ordered this and couldn‚Äôt wait to get it in the mail! I unpackaged, cleaned and made the chicken caprese last night for dinner. It‚Äôs very easy to use and manual is fairly simple to understand. The pre-heat option is a nice touch & I love that it‚Äôs dishwasher safe. I already know what we are making next!

Love the size of this air fryer! I started with a 2.75 qt air fryer with a round basket and it just wasn't large enough. The 5.8 qt capacity with a basket that is a 'squared off oval' (hard to explain, trust me it's wonderful) has enough space to cook most anything. Although it is larger, the overall footprint isn't significantly bigger compared to the smaller air fryers. Is also quieter, almost too quiet. I really have to pay attention to hear the beeping when it is completed cooking, but that isn't a deal breaker.

The preset buttons and pre-heating is a great bonus! Extremely useful if you like to cook all the skinnytaste recipes as it is the same air fryer that she uses, so it takes all the guesswork out of cooking. Highly recommend this air fryer to all. Definitely a step up from other air fryers!

reviews.reviewTitle: Love Love my Skinny Taste Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText:
I love my skinny taste air fryer. I was really impressed by the ease of use and loved the accompanying recipes from Skinny Taste. I am so happy I waited to order this air fryer from Skinny Taste.

I have been making Skinny Taste's recipes for years and this air fryer is the perfect compliment to her air fryer recipes. The first day I made sweet potato fries, which came out perfect, and then the second day Salmon. I highly recommend this appliance for quickly making healthy and easy recipes.

Ok so this is the best thing in my kitchen right now. My husband got me the instant pot for Christmas I thought we would use alot but really only like a few things in it. THIS HOWEVER I have used the past 2 nights and LOVE it. Cutlets, fries, zucchini and my kids loved it all. My son is pretty picky and lives when I make cutlets but I hate the mess it makes. This they cook in 6 minutes. Fries in 12min Zucchini i did for 6 to. Clean up is a wet sponge quickly a BREEZE. I THINK I WILL BE USING THIS THE WHOLE SUMMER PLUS.

reviews.reviewTitle: Big Size with the right price
reviews.reviewText: Upgrading my small airfryer into big size 5.8 qt. one is a very good decision. What I like most of this air fryer is the size and the pre-heating option which my old one doesnt have. It can fit a whole chicken and some stuff on it. Also it is very easy to use and clean. The touch screen is awesome with 8 cooking presets and it cook really good.I highly recommend this air fryer brand, not just for good quality but also for cooking healthy foods in less than an hour. Less oil,less calories and less fats.It is dishwasher safe which is very convenient to awash. It comes with free cookbook and user manual to guide you as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Disappointing. Shuts off halfway through cooking.
reviews.reviewText: Like many others, I got a lemon. Used it 2 times and after that, if shuts off halfway though cooking and won‚Äôt turn back on again for over an hour. So disappointing. The two things I did make were good, but this is not a high quality machine. I am awaiting a response from Vremi.

¬†I LOVE my newest kitchen gadget - this air fryer üòç. I made some keto chicken tenders, cooked some slices of squash and zucchini in it, and cooked some tater tots and chicken nuggets in it for my son tonight. They all came out wonderful. The machine hums very quietly. It also cleaned super easily. I also love that it has a button to start the cooking process so you know for sure that it's working.

I never did buy an instant pot when they became popular, but follow Skinnytaste on Instagram and she talked me into this air fryer! I'm SO glad I tried it. So far I've made chicken thighs, asparagus, meatballs, bacon, french fries and potato skins. All with tons of flavor and so much healthier and faster than usual! I love that it doesn't heat up my kitchen or use as much electricity as an oven. It's very easy to clean and the nonstick is effective. I hope Skinnytaste comes out with a set of accessories! The manual warned that it would have a strong plastic smell the first time you use it. I noticed that it took about 4 times for that smell to go away. I preordered this and it sounds like many have had issues with theirs. Very glad I didn't get a defective one, fingers crossed mine continues to work properly! The one thing I'd change is the default time. Should be 10 minutes, not 15 because everything I've made so far is much faster!

I‚Äôve been following Gina for over a decade, since way before her first cookbook, and to see that she had her own endorsed fryer, I was excited and couldn‚Äôt wait to get my own.

I was extremely disappointed. Fryer did not cook food as directed. Heat levels were off, as was the amount of time to cook anything. I tried cooking 3 of Gina‚Äôs meals, and not one single meal came out. Everything was undercooked and had to be put in for a second round. Also, basket came unattached from tray when removing it from the fryer, almost dumping scolding hot food all over me.

I hate to say it, but please do not waste your money on this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Dont buy a cheap air fryer like I initially did
reviews.reviewText: This is my second air fryer. I had a basic fryer, but upgraded to this. The main selling point of this for me was the added buttons and features that it had vs my old fryer. I also have other vremi products and have generally been blow away by the quality and marketing they use compared to other products sold on Amazon. I can tell you that the additional settings on this helped me make a better tasting meal than my prior air oven. Generally I had burned potatoes and they were still raw. With the Vremi I was able to cook them to perfection on the first try.

Came and didn‚Äôt work, the display just flashed garble, none of the other buttons would work, unplugged it, started again and then no reading at all and couldn‚Äôt even get it turned on.....very disappointed, waited a long time for it....I really don‚Äôt even want to give it one star but telling me I have to assign a star..

Update: I have now had this air fryer for a couple of months, and while I do LOVE the food that I make, I would agree with others that there definitely is something "off" with this particular machine. Mine almost immediately stopped closing all the way (however it still cooks) and the logo wiped up almost immediately. Once in awhile the display is wonky, but for the most part I have been able to consistently use it. Not sure I would buy this particular one again.

Used the air fryer for the first time tonight and I am hooked! Made turkey burgers and fries and couldn't believe how tasty everything was considering how little oil/fat was used. This machine is going to get a lot of use in my kitchen this summer, I am already dreaming up different burger combinations to try. I had never used an air fryer before and found it to be very user friendly. I will say it is much larger than I thought, BUT when feeding a family this is going to come in handy. I could make everyone's burgers at once which was nice. Highly recommend! I own all of Skinnytaste's cookbooks and nothing she creates ever disappoints!

In a world of fatty foods, it is so nice to know, I can create meals without the added grease and lards. For a happy healthier me and family! It is so simple, and just as good taste wise to "fry" my food. I don't think there is anything I can't make in my air fryer. And I will say Vremi, products ( I have been buying for a few years now, are good quality products. I am their Number one fan!! thanks again Vremi for yet another awesome product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the concept - but rusty after 1 month
reviews.reviewText: I've never owned an air fryer before, so was excited to try this because I love Skinnytaste. So far, I do love what it does. The issues so far: It's says dishwasher friendly, but its starting to rust - the basket and the interior?? Frustrating. Smaller things - not sure if this is true with all air fryers - but the basket is so deep I am constantly touching the sides with my hand and getting small burn when trying to "flip". The logo has literally wiped off on the outside - Not even sure how that happened to be honest. Mine seems to do what it says though, and the food I have made so far has been delicious. I just wish it didn't rust!!!

This air fryer is amazing! I love the digital features and preset buttons for specific types of food. It cooks very fast and every thing cooks evenly. The food taste great. It cooks meat (chicken, pork chops, steak, etc) quick and evenly, without drying it out, leaving the meat nice and juicy! It's also great for reheating items, even fried food reheated in it, turn out great. I highly recommend this air fryer, you won't be disappointed!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product to help you and your family eat healthier!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this air fryer because my husband cooks so much food in our deep fryer and I hate all the grease splatter all over my walls and cabinets. Plus this will be so much healthier for him. He was reluctant at first, but once I showed him how to use it he has not used the deep fryer since and even said we could get rid of it, yay!! There is so much you can cook in it and it‚Äôs quicker and tastes great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cooks frozen snacks in a zap
reviews.reviewText: The very first time I used my new air fryer, my food smelled like a new electrical appliance, so I highly recommend you heat it up a few times before cooking anything. The second time I used it to reheat leftover fried chicken, no kidding my chicken tasted so much better reheated. Now, I‚Äôve had my air fryer for a few months and my only regret it not having bought it sooner

reviews.reviewTitle: Everything I have made so far has come out very delicious
reviews.reviewText: I love my air fryer!!! I use it to cook a bunch of different things. I do a lot of grilling but I don't like cooking meat indoors because of the smoke and grease that gets everywhere. This air fryer does not smoke and grease does not escape. Everything I have made so far has come out very delicious. It's also very fast. I have no complaints so far and I'm very glad I got this air fryer.

Just loved this fryer used it so much since May of 2019. But sadly today August 2 2019 it died. In the process of fixing dinner the display went black and it stuck on and would not turn off. I knew it would happen since so many people had faulty units even from day one. I truly hope Vremi gets all the bugs worked out with their design because this was such an easy air fryer to use.

I purchased this fryer in July and from the moment that it arrived I am using it few times per week with different type of food. It is the perfect size and extremely easy to use and clean it. I really don't understand the negative reviews, maybe they got a defective batch. Mine works great, no issues at all. I absolutely love it and I am very happy with this purchase. I recommend this fryer to anyone that want to eat healthier.

Absolutely LOVE this air fryer.
It holds so much food and makes everything I've made in it thus far crispy on outside and juicy in middle. Every meal has been delicious. The presets are wonderful. Also I saw a few bad reviews based on technical issues. As with any new product there may always be some flaws in beginning but I had to give Vremi's customer service a call at one point and their service was outstanding. Totally reccomend buying this. You will get so much use out of it.

When unpacking , the basket would not come out easily. I released inner basket, outer basket came tumbling out fell and now is cracked and pieces have broken off. All before I got to use. Plastic bag around inner basket prevented from easily pulling out. Bad plastic/ chemical smell also.
Love the air fryer...easy to use...easy clean up. Large capacity..

reviews.reviewTitle: made my cooking is easier and also easy to clean, easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: I bought ‚ÄúVremi Air Fryer‚Äù 5.8 Quart, I very loved it! made my cooking is easier and also easy to clean, easy to use. it‚Äôs good quality and bigger than my old one. Thanks for for a good product.

This air fryer is incredible! I bought the recipe book along with the air fryer and we've used it almost everyday since we received it. The air fryer came earlier than expected and is simple to use. The basket is large enough for me to put food for our family of 5 in it which makes for quicker cooking. All of the recipes we have tried in it have been great; some of our favorites include the eggrolls, chicken tenders, and fries. I love skinnytaste and all of her products and appreciate her quick responses to questions, feedback, or posts about making her recipes. This air fryer seems to be a good quality and we love the presets that match up with the cooking times skinnytaste uses in her recipes! It makes it easy to program for everyone-my fiance, my mom, and myself included. I would HIGHLY recommend ordering this air fryer (and the cookbook) if you're looking for a healthier way to eat some delicious tasting food! When I move out, I will definitely be ordering another for myself!

I just got my Vremi, and I'm so happy. Not only did it come one day earlier than anticipated, but I also got to use it the same day due to easy to follow instructions. The air fryer comes with a little recipe pamphlet developed by Gina Homolka, whom I'm a big fan of. It was actually through her blog I found this product. The air fryer is easy to use, and I really like the preset settings - such as fries & different types of meat, it is easy to clean (which is a must for me) and the food I've made thus far has come out great. It should also be noted that I ordered another brand first, but it didn't meet my expectations, in terms of preset functions and recipe collection, so I returned it and got the Vremi instead.

I am so excited to finally have an air fryer. I wanted this one specifically since it was backed by Skinnytaste. I would say 75% of my cooking are her recipes. The food I have made in it comes out great. I have made chicken, salmon and shrimp in the air fryer with all great results.

My only issue is the plastic part that covers the basket release button broke off after a few weeks, It doesn't hurt the operating of the air fryer so I guess it is ok. I have noticed just recently some of the black color of the basket is coming off. I have never put it in the dishwasher even though it says it can. I only hand wash it. Once again, it does not change how it operates so I guess it is ok.

First time air fryer user! The fries I made were the best fries I ever had! Made chicken too in it and it turned out perfect! I didnt really see too much fat in the pan after cooking. That may be my only concern. But the food I made was amazing and it definitely beat cooking in the oven with the hot weather. I hope this fryer last forever because I'm in love with the cooking method and how easy it was.

I had a smaller air fryer and decided to get a larger one. So happy I got this one!! The size is perfect for a family, so many quick cooking options and everything comes out perfectly. Such a great purchase, really happy with it!

I love this air fryer! I had a previous air fryer which was much smaller and was not electronic; I wasn‚Äôt able to cook nearly as much as I am now in one round. Saves so much time. I tested mine out with a basic recipe first - hard boiled eggs! It passed the test and the yolk was perfectly creamy too. Yum! Just finished making ‚ÄúBreakfast Turkey Sausage‚Äù from Gina‚Äôs new air fryer cookbook in my new air fryer and it came out amazingly delicious! I actually forgot to spray the basket before putting the turkey patties in and thought I was done for as I previously would have to scrape food off of my older air fryer if I forgot my cooking spray. However, the patties slid right off so easily. The non-stick coating works great! Making everything less greasy too, which is a plus for me. I would highly recommend this air fryer. I‚Äôm so excited to try all of these new recipes. Thanks Gina!

I‚Äôm loving this product so far, easy to use and clean. I‚Äôd suggest using a little spray oil on your food to give it that real fried taste, without giving it a full bath in oil. I also tried a pork chop in there, no coating or bread crumbs, just a plain salt and pepper pork chop. It came out cooked perfectly and juicy.

This is a fuller size air fryer, which comes in handy when I have family get togethers. I have made French fries and mozzarella sticks in it so far and looking into some actual recipes to whip up and cook in it.
Easy to use and quick clean up. Cheaper than similar models so it‚Äôs a great deal.

I was really excited for this to arrive as I ordered during the preorder a month or so ago. Unfortunately, I didn't even get to try it as the basket portion arrived broken. A latch was broken off and the plastic covering on one side was broken,preventing it from closing. I received a refund but am disappointed as I love SkinnyTaste and was excited for my air fryer. Maybe just a bad first batch.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality and price of air fryer
reviews.reviewText: I‚Äôm in love with my air fryer. It helps a lot for my dinner cook time. My husband and my son love grilled chicken asian style. If you want to make healthy food for family I really recommend buy one. It took the oil out from meat you can see it and taste still yummy. It took short time than use oven. It‚Äôs important for me. It‚Äôs easy to clean and leave it dry.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great - love the big basket
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer works really great. Just a note on the basket, the little clip has to be snapped down after the basket is inserted before you put it in and pull it out. Mine has held chicken breasts and other heavier items with no problem. It's pretty big, so it needs some counter space, but I love it and use it all the time. Super easy to clean too!

I have used this air fryer everyday since I received it. I absolutely love it. So easy to use. My kitchen tends to get very hot with a regular oven. The air fryer keeps my kitchen cool when using it but I get the same results or better than my oven. I like crispy fish, chicken etc and the airfryer gives me that crispness with virtually no oil . I am one person so the size is ideal for me. Plus this airfryer is sponsored by Skinnytaste/ GINA Homolka and I regularly use her recipes and swear by them

Okay, I am not a cooking appliance gal at all and was completely hesitate on using an air fryer. I am still trying to fall in love with my instant pot! I was shocked at how easy it was to cook with the air fryer and even more shocked at how delicious everything has come out. The first thing we made was potato wedges, and they were crispy on the outside and moist on the inside. When we make potato wedges in the oven it takes about 30 - 45 minutes plus lots of oil. We had them ready to devour in 20 minutes using about a teaspoon of oil. Then we made fried chicken and were SOLD. We never make fried chicken because of how much oil is used, the mess and the time. Crispy delicious fried chicken in less than 30 minutes with hardly any mess or oil. Needless to say, this has become a regular cooking appliance and we have even baked cinnamon rolls in it. Bonus it is easy to clean and goes into the dishwasher. Move over Instant Pot you are on your way out the door!

reviews.reviewTitle: By far the best air fryer I have ever used.
reviews.reviewText: I sincerely hope that those that gave a less than stellar rating are given the opportunity for a replacement. I just received mine last week from the ‚Äúnew batch‚Äù and have used it everyday without any issues (knock on wood). My Vremi is replacing my NuWave that I thought was the best thing since sliced bread until I used Gina‚Äôs. I was blown away. Even the taste of the food is far superior. I have never ever written a review of a product but feel so strongly on the performance that I wanted to share.

I haven't had the mechanical issues that others seem to be having [yet] but i did have a issue figuring out how to work it. If i preheat it without a mode,just by temperature then pull out the basket to put food on, it shuts off and i have to power it back on. It only restarts without having to completely start over if a mode is picked. Which i found out by talking to customer service!

It's very easy to clean but i do have to say that after having used it once and i followed the cleaning instructions, which was wipe with a warm cloth and mild dish soap (I used dawn) I noticed that the logo "skinny taste" was smeared??? I swiped it with my thumb and it smeared more, so i grabbed a paper towel and with applying barely any pressure it wiped the entire logo off. I've only had it a wee and washed/wiped it down once.

This thing is so fun! I had put my foot down on any more kitchen gadgets after my insta pot purchase a few years ago just because I have very little space. After following skinny taste for a few months I decided I needed this. Glad I gave in and got one. It cooks well first time and also really good for re heating things you want crispy
Very pleased with this air fryer. Has buttons to click for fries etc for easy cooking. Easy temperature control. The handle pulls out the bucket for easy cleaning. Would definitely recommend.
Great product! I got this as a replacement for my air fryer that stopped working and I‚Äôm so glad I did. I like this one so much better. Love the size of it as well.

I like most things about this EXCEPT there is a strong plastic odor. I've used it several times hoping it will go away.
It's still there and makes using disappointing. It Cooks great, easy to clean, but just smells like plastic.
Customer service for Vremi is great- they offered to ship a new unit out immediately. I was very impressed with the ease of contacting customer service.
Love my air fryer!! I‚Äôve made mushrooms, chicken, sweet potato fries and more!! Looking forward to new recipes too!! Fits good on my counter, pretty easy to understand and cooks quick!

reviews.reviewTitle: It works very well, cleans up like a breeze.
reviews.reviewText: Have been cooking many Skinny Taste recipes and they all work beautifully in the air fryer. Quicker then the oven, no or little oil. Very satisfied and would recommend. Is well built and easy to understand funtions.

I love this AirFryer! It is the perfect size. I make a TON of Skinnytaste recipes and it‚Äôs so easy to know that everything has already been tested out on the very same AirFryer by Gina. No trying to adjust time and temperature on a different brand. I love it!!
Me encanto

I have never owned an air fryer, but when this one came out, I had to have it! I'm a huge Skinny Taste Fan! I got it out of the box, plugged it in, and it pre-heated just fine. Then I pulled out the outer basket to add my food, and the outer basket fell off onto my counter rather hard. I realize I made a mistake, but goodness, the air fryer wouldn't work after that. I never even cooked anything in it. I Called customer service and will have to wait 4 weeks for a replacement, so just getting my money back.

I used the air fryer a few times and LOVED it. I made eggs, salmon, and zucchini boats. It took a little getting used to, but all-in-all, super happy with my purchase. And clean-up was a breeze.

BUT I did notice that the tray that holds the basket didn't really snug up to the unit when it was locked in place. There was virtually no gap and it didn't affect the cooking and it was barely noticeable so I let it be.

Maybe that had nothing to do with the issue I now have, but the tray and basket no longer latch to the air fryer itself. You can slide them in but you don't need to press the button to slide them right back out. Nothing appears to be broken, the unit has been on my kitchen counter since it was purchased - it just stopped locking.

I waited to purchase an air fryer because it's skinny taste and I wanted to support the brand, but now I'm kind of bummed. Amazon is refunding me, so that's good but now I'm back in the market for an air fryer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great fryer! But learn to cook!
reviews.reviewText:
We finally got the air fryer my family wanted for everrrr!

We cook a lot of things and our favorite is to cook slices of pork. It comes out just like you would on a bbq grill but without the smoke!
Popular items are also chicken and wings and fries.

We bought air fryer papers to place on the bottom to soak up excess oils.

Overall, we like the way the operations work on the fryer. There is some testing you do need to make sure you don‚Äôt burn your food though. I didn‚Äôt realize it until I‚Äôd actually burned food! But not the manufacturer‚Äôs fault. I overestimated the time needed.

Just received the air fryer today. I haven't used it yet...BUT I wanted to review the features I have noticed so far. I have owned 3 air fryers. 2 Power XLs and a Kalorik. All 3 have had problems with the teflon peeling off and food sticking after just 3 or 4 months after using it. I called Verimi customer service before purchasing and explained what seems to be a problem of the teflon coming off with air fryers. The person that answered was in the US and spoke perfect English. She said that it has been a problem with 1 in 20 of their air fryers and they replace the basket s free of charge for 2 years!. She said they have been using the air fryer daily in their office for over a year and have not had any problems with it. I really appreciated their honesty. Their warranty is a 2 year warranty. NONE of the other air fryers I have purchased have more than a 90 day warranty! I noticed some differences with the Vremi air fryer out of the box and I wanted to write this review while they are fresh on my mind. The packaging was very professional. The air fryer has a grounded 3 pronged heavy duty cord. None of the others have that. I like that for safety reasons. The panel is very user friendly. I has a preheat setting of 3 minutes. When I washed the basket and outer pot noticed the towel sliding over the teflon like a newly waxed car. I tried on the XL and not so. The heating element is covered with stainless steel mesh. NONE of the others have that. So far I recommend the Vremi air fryer mainly because of the warranty and customer service. I will let you know if the teflon peeling is a problem.
This is my first air fryer. I have had it for two days now and it is absolutely amazing. Cooked frozen burgers in minutes. A must have!

I have never used an air fryer before coming into this, so I had no idea what to expect. I‚Äôve heard stories from friends that you can do anything in the air fryer, from french fries, to steak, to wings, to even pizza. I decided to make wings and french fries. The one complaint I‚Äôve heard from air fryers was you have to stop cooking halfway through and rotate whatever you‚Äôre cooking inside so it cooks evenly. My wings I flipped around 12 minutes and cook for an additional 12 minutes. These wings and fries are probably the best that I‚Äôve made it home, from normally using an oven, I plan on making everything out of an air fryer from here on out. I was able to fit maybe 7 full wings in on a row. The amount of grease and sludge that came off the wings and drained into the pan was disgusting. And to think we‚Äôd eat that normally. Highlighter for size purposes in photo.

¬†Can you say Crispy Pork Belly In 20 that's Right Loving this Bad Boy air Fryer tray is a bit bigger then those I've seen at Walmart....I know its supposed to be used to cook healthier and it does but crispy pork Belly is a must now amongst wings and fries my other favorites you are definitely cutting out some fat and cholesterol while keeping it crisp and flavorful....easy to use modes one touch buttons for different meats easy to clean after a quick fry.....it does take up some coumterspace but I use this more than my stove or oven so I'd say those are taking up kitchen space lol most people put their Appliances away after use not This one This Stays used always as my whole family can make quick meals as they come and go with little mess so I'm extremely happy for that....

The air fryer arrived early and works great, have been using it a lot! I had an issue with the fryer cutting out once around the fifth use, but unplugged it and replugged it in and haven't had an issue since (about ten or 15 more uses since then). Even though I've cleaned everything multiple times - and this nonstick surface is THE BEST - there's still a lingering plastic smell/taste to foods cooked. But the customer service provided by Vremi is horrible. I used their chat feature to ask what accessories might work with the unit and they were unable to answer, saying they'd refer the question to their product specialist. That was on May 21, and twice they have closed the inquiry believing it resolved although they have provided no answer. I can't imagine how difficult it would be to return the unit. I love Gina's recipes and the Skinnytaste brand and am disappointed that the company she chose to partner with is so unreliable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Packed with features, easy-to-use and cooks with fantastic flavor!
reviews.reviewText:
I first got into air frying thanks to the Skinnytaste's One and Done cookbook which includes a number of air frying recipes, but I started by buying an inexpensive small model from JC Penney to experiment (just in case I didn't enjoy the flavor or trouble of this new approach to cooking).

I got hooked! The flavor of foods cooked with air frying is remarkably close to traditional oil frying without the extra calories. Unfortunately, the model I bought was far too small and simplistic with only timer and temperature knobs.

As a Skinnytaste fan for a very long time, I was ecstatic to see Vremi release an actual Skinnytaste Air Fryer so I could fully take advantage of the Skinnytaste recipes I had as well as the ones that were included in their most recent release - the Skinnytaste Air Fryer Cookbook.

The Vremi Skinnytaste Air Fryer is really outstanding and completely worth its reasonable price. The fryer is incredibly easy-to-use with an intuitive interface and combines a huge capacity with a huge amount of versatility from its features.

Although not necessary, the digital touch-screen and presets makes it so simple to cook almost anything. What a fantastic piece of cooking technology! If you have any interest in air frying, I highly recommend you skip the smaller-sized entry-level models and pick up one like this Vremi.

If you're like me and love fried foods but hate the unhealthy results, I think you'll absolutely love air frying.

This thing runs so quiet. It‚Äôs more like a fast crock pot. I made some vegetables zucchini and squash which didn‚Äôt go quite as well as I had planned, but they were eatable. I did make some homemade fries and they turned out great. Chicken cooked in it was delicious and moist. I definitely didn‚Äôt go wrong on this one. Every home needs one. My kids wants it since it works so easy and clean up is not as dreadful as I had thought it would be.

#1 thing I like about this product - the basket is HUGE! I hated my old air fryer because it was too small for my needs. This one is large enough to cook an entire 3.5 pound chicken. It cooks beautifully and evenly. French fries came out crisp and yummy. My only complaint is the controls are difficult to understand and use. My old air fryer was very intuitive. This one takes work to make it do what you want. That's why I didn't give it 5 stars

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Air Fryer, just a few small glitches .
reviews.reviewText: So, overall I love this air fryer. I am a huge fan of Gina, and so having her back this up made me trust it. It is super easy to both use and clean. I only have two small issues with the machine, the small cover that protects you from accidently pressing the tray release button broke off and the Skinnytaste logo came off after my first wash (and I hand wash my stuff). But, other than that it works great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect size for a family of 4
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fryer approximately 1 month ago and have been using it regularly. I have been wanting one for a long time and wa told about this one from a friend so purchased it. On the day I received it, I tried a batch of fries and they came out perfectly. We make a lot of Indian food in the house and sometimes there is a lot of frying involved... so instead of frying I air fried my samosas in this little gem and they came out perfectly golden brown and crispy. The size is nice and big perfect for our family of 4. The best part is that the tray is dishwasher safe so easy to clean. I definitely recommend this product.

I'm not sure what I was expecting with an airfryer but I know that my kids eat a ton of fries and chicken nuggets and it has really been a game-changer. My boys are able to make their own fries anytime they want and they cook a lot better than when we use the toaster oven and I'm glad that we don't have to use the regular oven during this hot summer. I've really been impressed with how it Cooks fries. If you give them a toss in the middle they come out just about perfect. I used the product one time a few days after receiving it. The recipe from Gina‚Äôs cookbook was awesome, however, after cleaning the basket I could not close the drawer without pushing very hard. I included pictures of the basket edges where it seems to be hitting something while sliding into the unit. I‚Äôm so disappointed and will look for another brand.

This cuts a bunch of my meals cooking time in half! The tip someone shared with me is that when cooking you keep the same temp as instructed but cut the time in half. We love the texture and flavor of the food we make with the fryer. It is also as easy to clean as they say it is. You just wipe it out with some warm water and a little soap. Some favorites we have had include left over fries that we actually enjoyed! (Whaaat?!), orange chicken, zucchini noodles, egg roles, and there are so many thing I still want to try!!! Very happy with my purchase!

I have some safety concerns about the mechanism that prevents the basket from disconnecting from the outer pot. Twice the basket released from the outer pot even though the button cover was in place properly. Now the button cover has broken rendering it unusable and unsafe. Waiting for a reply from Vremi. I have a tremendous amount of respect for Skinnytaste and waited for this air fryer. It is easy to use and the food turns out great. I was even able to cook a steak! Update: received a quick reply from Vremi and replacement parts are on the way. Received the replacement parts and there is now a definite 'click' when the basket is put in the outer pot. The logo does wash off with repeated cleaning. Does not affect function. I love this appliance!

We love our Skinnytaste Air Fryer. We‚Äôve used it multiple times and it operates as it should. It seems to be a solid built machine that is easy to use and easy to clean. It‚Äôs great to not have to heat up the house for a quick side potatoes or ‚Äúfried‚Äù veggies. Cooked BBQ chicken to top a salad and it was excellent! (I overlooked it a little but that was my error and it still tasted great!). It does have a larger ‚Äúfootprint‚Äù but for a family of 4 we needed a larger fryer so this was expected.

I‚Äôve been wanting this Air Fryer for a while. My son purchased it as a surprise. We‚Äôve had it for about a week and have been very impressed. First I will say, it is BIG and takes up quite a bit of counter space. The first thing we tried were frozen steak fries. They turned out really good. We‚Äôve also made two versions of chicken wings, chicken parm and hard boiled eggs. This thing works great and the food has come out perfect. It‚Äôs also very easy to clean. The two pieces fit in the dishwasher with no problems but I‚Äôve mostly washed by hand because I don‚Äôt want to start the dishwasher when it‚Äôs not full. All this to say we love the air fryer and think it‚Äôs going to be getting a lot of use at our house.
